alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Clay; Coosa; Shelby; Talladega (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 6:24PM CDT until July 21 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Talladega County in east central Alabama... Chilton County in central Alabama... Southern Shelby County in central Alabama... Eastern Bibb County in central Alabama... Coosa County in east central Alabama... Southwestern Clay County in east central Alabama... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 624 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Waldo to near Talladega Springs to 6 miles southeast of West Blocton, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Pelham, Helena, Talladega, Sylacauga, Calera, Clanton, Montevallo, Childersburg, Columbiana, Jemison, Wilsonville, Goodwater, Rockford, Kellyton, Talladega Springs, Weogufka, Equality, Stewartville and Thorsby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
